name: Ahriman's Prophecy
description:
Ahriman's Prophecy is a well-loved game released in 2004 by Aveyond Studios (formerly Amaranth Games). It was created using RPG Maker 2003. This reboot is created using RPG Maker XP as the sequels in Aveyond series.


Synopsis

Aia, a beautiful fantasy world doomed to be destroyed by the demon, Ahriman. In a desperate attempt to stop the prophecy, the Daughters of Light send you, a young but powerful magic wielder, on a difficult quest to unlock the secrets of the prophecy and hopefully, learn how to stop it.

Characters
  • Talia Maurva, a young woman from the small island village of Elden. She hopes to become an herbalist some day. She loves her village and has no desire to leave.
  • Devin Perry, a young man from the small island village of Elden. He is an apprentice blacksmith. One day, he hopes to take over the smithy in the village.
  • Alicia Pendragon, the crown princess of Thais. Alicia doesn't want to live the life of a typical princess. She wishes to become a great sword woman. Don't get on her bad side, because she has a temper.
  • Jack is a scoundrel, but a darn good thief if you need one. He's often in and out of the Thais jail system.
  • Frederick le Mew dreams of being a successful shapeshifter. He's learned how to turn into a chicken, but that’s not enough to satisfy his goal. Someday he'll learn to shift into something terrifying. If only.
  • Haddan Albardk, a mercenary of short stature and wide breadth. He's extremely strong and will work for you for the right price. Don't get in his way if he swings his hammer.
What's new/changed?
  • Keep all playable characters in the party
  • Turn-based battle system
  • New side quests
  • New areas to explore
  • Some minor additions to the story
Afterword

If you're a member on Aveyond forum, you might know that I've been working on this project for a while. I can't tell the release date for the full game, because I'm still working on it.

I can't wait to hear your feedback about this demo.
